item.text: Now when Jesus knew that the Pharisees had heard that he was winning and baptizing more disciples than John

(<st data-num="2544">although</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptizing</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> were),<n id="1" />
he left Judea and set out once more for Galilee.
But he had to pass through Samaria.

<st data-num="3767">Now</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> a <st data-num="4540" class="">Samaritan</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4965" class="">Sychar</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4139" class="">near</st> the <st data-num="5564">plot of land</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2384" class="">Jacob</st> had <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>.<n id="3" />
Jacob’s well was there, so Jesus, since he was tired from the journey, sat right down beside the well. It was about noon.
A Samaritan woman came to draw water. Jesus said to her, “Give me some water to drink.”

(<st data-num="1063">For</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> had <st data-num="565">gone off</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="5160">supplies</st>.<n id="1" />)<n id="2" />
So the Samaritan woman said to him, “How can you—a Jew—ask me, a Samaritan woman, for water to drink?” (For Jews use nothing in common with Samaritans.)
Jesus answered her, “If you had known the gift of God and who it is who said to you, ‘Give me some water to drink,’ you would have asked him, and he would have given you living water.”

“<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>,”<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1135">woman</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">no</st> <st data-num="502" class="">bucket</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5421" class="">well</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="901" class="">deep;</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> do you <st data-num="2192" class="">get</st> this<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>?<n id="5" />
Surely you’re not greater than our ancestor Jacob, are you? For he gave us this well and drank from it himself, along with his sons and his livestock.”
Jesus replied, “Everyone who drinks some of this water will be thirsty again.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drinks</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> will <st data-num="3364">never</st> be <st data-num="1372" class="">thirsty</st> <st data-num="1519 165">again</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> I will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> will <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="4077" class="">fountain</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="242">springing up</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.”

The <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>, <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> I will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1372" class="">thirsty</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> have to <st data-num="1330" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1759" class="">here</st> to <st data-num="501">draw<n id="1" /> water</st>.”<n id="2" />

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="5217">Go</st> <st data-num="5455" class="">call</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2064">come back</st> <st data-num="1759" class="">here</st>.”<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st>.” <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="2573">Right</st> you are when you <st data-num="3004">said</st>,<n id="2" /> ‘I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husband,’</st><n id="3" />
for you have had five husbands, and the man you are living with now is not your husband. This you said truthfully!”
The woman said to him, “Sir, I see that you are a prophet.

<st data-num="1473" class="">Our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">fathers</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> people<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> people <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="4100">Believe</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> you will <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>.

<st data-num="4771">You</st> people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st>. <st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> a <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> here<n id="2" />—<st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="228" class="">true</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worshipers</st> will <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">seeks</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5108">such people</st> to be<n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worshipers</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the people who <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.”

The <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3323" class="">Messiah</st> is <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st>” (the one <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> <st data-num="5547">Christ</st>);<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="3752">whenever</st> he<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st>, he will <st data-num="312" class="">tell</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="537" class="">everything</st>.”<n id="4" />
Jesus said to her, “I, the one speaking to you, am he.”
Now at that very moment his disciples came back. They were shocked because he was speaking with a woman. However, no one said, “What do you want?” or “Why are you speaking with her?”

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5201">water jar</st>, <st data-num="565">went off</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">town</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>,<n id="1" />

“<st data-num="1204">Come</st>, <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> I <st data-num="3745">ever</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">did</st>. Surely <st data-num="3778" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3385">can’t</st> <st data-num="1510">be</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Messiah</st>,<n id="1" /> can he?”<n id="2" />
So they left the town and began coming to him.
Meanwhile the disciples were urging him, “Rabbi, eat something.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1035" class="">food</st> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">nothing</st> about.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> began <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> <st data-num="240" class="">another</st>, “<st data-num="3361">No</st> <st data-num="5100">one</st> <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> anything<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st>, did they?”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1699">My</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="5048" class="">complete</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3756">Don’t</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘There <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5072" class="">four</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">more</st> <st data-num="5072" class="">months</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> the <st data-num="2326" class="">harvest</st>?’ I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1869 3788">look up</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2300" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="5561" class="">fields</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2326" class="">harvest</st>!

The one who <st data-num="2325" class="">reaps</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">receives</st> <st data-num="3408" class="">pay</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4863" class="">gathers</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the one who <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="2325" class="">reaps</st> can <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st> <st data-num="3674" class="">together</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> instance the <st data-num="3056" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="228" class="">true</st>,<n id="1" /> ‘One <st data-num="4687" class="">sows</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="2325" class="">reaps.’</st>
I sent you to reap what you did not work for; others have labored and you have entered into their labor.”
Now many Samaritans from that town believed in him because of the report of the woman who testified, “He told me everything I ever did.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="4541" class="">Samaritans</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they began <st data-num="2065" class="">asking</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="3306" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="2" /> He <st data-num="3306" class="">stayed</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="4183">more</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st>.
They said to the woman, “No longer do we believe because of your words, for we have heard for ourselves, and we know that this one really is the Savior of the world.”
After the two days he departed from there to Galilee.

(<st data-num="1063">For</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> had <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> a <st data-num="4396" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honor</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="3968">country</st>.)<n id="1" />
So when he came to Galilee, the Galileans welcomed him because they had seen all the things he had done in Jerusalem at the feast (for they themselves had gone to the feast).
Now he came again to Cana in Galilee where he had made the water wine. In Capernaum there was a certain royal official whose son was sick.

When he <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="2240">come back</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st>, he <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2065" class="">begged</st> him<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2597">come down</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2390" class="">heal</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>, who was <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3362">Unless</st> you people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st> you will <st data-num="3364">never</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>!”<n id="2" />

“<st data-num="2962">Sir</st>,” the <st data-num="937" class="">official</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2597">come down</st> <st data-num="4250" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dies</st>.”
Jesus told him, “Go home; your son will live.” The man believed the word that Jesus spoke to him, and set off for home.
While he was on his way down, his slaves met him and told him that his son was going to live.
So he asked them the time<n id="1" /> when his condition began to improve,<n id="2" /> and<n id="3" /> they told him, “Yesterday at one o’clock in the afternoon<n id="4" /> the fever left him.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">realized</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> it was the <st data-num="1565">very</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="4771">Your</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> will <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st>,” <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="2532">along with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">household</st>.
Jesus did this as his second miraculous sign when he returned from Judea to Galilee.
